Container.Name: torrent-nfo-creator
Container.Overview: Web interface for creating torrent files and NFO files from video files using mediainfo CLI. Automatically creates hardlinks in your torrent folder with automated workflow for seeding and tracker management.

Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: Port for accessing the web interface

Config.Name: Media Source
Config.Description: Path to your source video files

Config.Name: Torrent Output
Config.Description: Path where torrent files and hardlinks will be created (must be on same filesystem as media)

Config.Name: Config Directory
Config.Description: Directory for application configuration and settings

Config.Name: NFO Output
Config.Description: Path where NFO files will be saved (optional, leave blank to save with torrents)

Config.Name: Default Tracker URL
Config.Description: Default tracker announce URL (can be changed per torrent in web UI)

Config.Name: Piece Size
Config.Description: Torrent piece size in KB (0 = auto-calculate based on file size)

Config.Name: Auto Hardlink
Config.Description: Automatically create hardlinks in torrent folder (true/false)

Config.Name: NFO Template
Config.Description: MediaInfo output format: full, basic, or custom

Config.Name: User ID
Config.Description: User ID for file permissions (99 = nobody on Unraid)

Config.Name: Group ID
Config.Description: Group ID for file permissions (100 = users on Unraid)
